title: Mobile-Based Mathematics Microlearning: Online Course Development Through Participatory Observation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Enhancing practical math application skills through project-based assessment in smartphone-based limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can design and explain multi-step (3+) math problem-solving processes in mobile environments
Learners can analyze math models applied to real office management scenarios and propose at least three improvement strategies
Learners can complete peer evaluation and feedback cycles (3+) using smartphone apps

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
